GR14bhrgus_u:5826: gṛhītvā caiva tatsarvaṃ dhyātvā devaṃ samarcayet /

GR14bhrgus_u:5829: dviguṇaṃ tu samuddīpya sauraṃ raudraṃ ca pāvakam // BhS_27.119 //

GR14bhrgus_u:5833: pūrvoktāṃ niṣkṛtiṃ hutvā dviguṇaṃ tu nidevayet // BhS_27.121 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5837: vaiṣṇapaṃ caiva hutvā tu paṭaṃ kṛtvār'cayetpunaḥ // BhS_27.123 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5840: tatkāle darśane hutvā vaiṣṇavaṃ brāhmameva ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:5841: raudraṃ ca pāvakaṃ hutvā vyāhṛtīśca tator'cayet // BhS_27.125 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5847: ekakālārcane hīne dvitīye dviguṇaṃ caret // BhS_27.128 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5849: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca puruṣa sūktaṃ tathaiva ca // BhS_27.129 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5853: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca puruṣasūktaṃ tathaiva ca // BhS_27.131 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5854: ālaye pariṣaddeva mantrān hutvā ca śaktitaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:5857: sabhyāgnau vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ sūktaṃ ca pauruṣam // BhS_27.133 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5861: tṛtīye triguṇaṃ caivaṃ vatsarānantu vardhayet // BhS_27.135 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5863: mahāśāntiṃ tu hutvaiva kṛtvā vaiṣṇavapūjanam // BhS_27.136 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5871: hīne haviṣyeka kāle dvitīye dviguṇaṃ bhavet // BhS_27.140 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5873: vaiṣṇavaṃ śrīmahīmantrān mūrti homaṃ tathā hunet // BhS_27.141 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5875: sopadaṃśamapakvaṃ ca śītaṃ paryuṣitaṃ tathā // BhS_27.142 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5877: vivṛtaṃ srāvitaṃ caiva vikṛtaṃ dṛṣṭi dūṣitam // BhS_27.143 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5880: āgneyaṃ vāruṇaṃ caiva vāyavyaṃ daśaśo hunet /
GR14bhrgus_u:5881: dviguṇaṃ tu punaḥkṛtvā prabhūtaṃ tu nivedayet // BhS_27.145 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5885: puṇyāhaṃ vācayitvaiva dviguṇaṃ cārcanaṃ haviḥ // BhS_27.147 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5887: nivedite tu haviṣi mantreṇāṣṭākṣareṇa tu // BhS_27.148 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5891: nivedite tu haviṣi śuddhodaissnāvyavai harim // BhS_27.150 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5893: aṣṭottaraśataṃ hutvā dviguṇaṃ tu nivedayet // BhS_27.151 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5897: prokṣya devaṃ susaṃprārdhya tadgṛhītvā nivedayet // BhS_27.153 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5901: asaṃskṛtaṃ tu tāṃbūlaṃ lepakeśānvitaṃ tathā // BhS_27.155 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5907: alābhe caiva sarveṣāṃ puṣpaṃ toyaṃ pragṛhyaca // BhS_27.158 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5909: nityahome vihīnetu vaiṣṇavaṃ daśaśo hunet // BhS_27.159 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5919: tasyopari yathoktaṃ tu baliberaṃ ca vinyaset // BhS_27.164 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5920: śirasā dhārayan pātraṃ trirdvirvā sakṛdeva vā /
GR14bhrgus_u:5921: dene tataḥ parīyācca devāgāraṃ pradakṣiṇam // BhS_27.165 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5927: hīne prātarbalau kuryānmadhyāhne dviguṇaṃ balim // BhS_27.168 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5928: tathā hīne ca madhyāhne rātrau triguṇamācaret /
GR14bhrgus_u:5929: ekāhe tu balau hīne nityāgnau vā mahānane // BhS_27.169 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5930: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca puruṣasūktaṃ tathaiva ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:5931: digdaivatyaṃ ca hutvā tu pradakṣiṇanuthācaret // BhS_27.170 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5935: dīpālābhe pāvakaṃ ca vyāhṛtyantaṃ yajettrayam // BhS_27.172 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5936: dvyahe tu dviguṇaṃ kurvāttṣahe triguṇameva ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:5939: puruṣasūktaṃ ca śrībhūmidaivatyaṃ brāhma meva ca // BhS_27.174 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5941: māne 'tīte tu padmāgnau vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktam // BhS_27.175 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5945: vardhaye dvatsarāntaṃ cāpyatīte vatsare punaḥ // BhS_27.177 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5946: sabhyaṃ saṃsādhya devābhimukhe vā dakṣiṇe nalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:5947: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca sūktaṃ pauruṣameva ca // BhS_27.178 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5949: hutvā cāryaṃ ca saṃpūjya balyuddharaṇamācaret // BhS_27.179 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5950: patite 'nnabalau bhūmyāṃ bhinne jīrṇe ca pūrvavat /
GR14bhrgus_u:5951: balimāpādya hutvā ca vaiṣṇavaṃ gāruḍaṃ tathā // BhS_27.180 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5954: sauraṃ saumyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ ca hutvā punarathācaret /
GR14bhrgus_u:5959: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca puruṣasūktaṃ tathaiva ca // BhS_27.184 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5962: vaiṣṇavaṃ mūrtimantraṃ ca hutvaiva daśaśaḥ kramāt /
GR14bhrgus_u:5965: akṛte balidāne tu prāśya pādodakaṃ hareḥ // BhS_27.187 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5967: pravṛttāyāṃ tu pūjāyāṃ havirdānāntameva ca // BhS_27.188 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5971: prasādaṃ vāpi gṛhṇīyāttatpūjā niṣphalā bhavet // BhS_27.190 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5973: tīrthaṃ puṣpaṃ tataḥ kṣīraṃ gandhaṃ ca tadanantaram // BhS_27.191 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5977: nitye karmaṇi sarvatra pūjakaṃ pūrvamarcayet // BhS_27.193 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5983: dviguṇaṃ tu samabhyarcya cānyaddviguṇa mācaret // BhS_27.196 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5985: pitā mṛṣyati putrāṇāṃ viśaṅkaṃ doṣasaṃcayam // BhS_27.197 //
GR14bhrgus_u:5986: pitā hi bhagavān viṣṇuputrāssyuḥ pūjakā hareḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:5989: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ trividhaṃ snapanaṃ bhavet // BhS_27.199 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6003: viṣṇusūktaṃ nṛsūktaṃ ca digīśānāṃ manuṃ hunet // BhS_27.206 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6007: anyathā vaiṣṇavaṃ mantraṃ śatavāraṃ japetsudhīḥ // BhS_27.208 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6008: pūrvarātrau pratisare hīne ca śayane tathā /
GR14bhrgus_u:6009: vaiṣṇavaṃ śrīmahīmantrān hutvā saudarśanaṃ tathā // BhS_27.209 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6011: emabere kautuke tu kartavye śayanaṃ vinā // BhS_27.210 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6013: kṛte 'ṃkurārpaṇe hīne snapane vaiṣṇapaṃ tathā // BhS_27.211 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6017: vaiṣṇavaṃ bhūmidaivatyaṃ paṅktīśasya manuṃ yajet // BhS_27.213 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6018: hīne śāntādyarcane ca vaiṣṇavaṃ śāntameva ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:6019: paṅktīśasyārcane hīne tanmantraṃ ca jayādīkān // BhS_27.214 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6023: bhūdaivatyaṃ ca juhuyānmṛtsu sarvāsvayaṃ vidhiḥ // BhS_27.216 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6025: dhānyeṣu vaiṣṇavaṃ caiva vāyavyaṃ ca hunedbudhaḥ // BhS_27.217 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6035: prāśanaṃ prokṣaṃ vāpi śāstre 'smin yatra codyate // BhS_27.222 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6047: ratnālābhe vaiṣṇavaṃ tu hutvā svarṇaṃ tu nikṣipet // BhS_27.228 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6048: vastrālābhe vaiṣṇavaṃ ca śrīdaivatyaṃ ca hāvayet /
GR14bhrgus_u:6049: yathoktasnapane hīne kathaṃ citsnapanaṃ caret // BhS_27.229 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6050: atha vā kārayec chuddhasnapanaṃ vā vidhānataḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:6055: akṛte niyate kālaṃ kṛte vāniyate tathā // BhS_27.232 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6059: anyathā tu kṛtaṃ kāryamakṛtaṃ syādasaṃśayam // BhS_27.234 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6060: anyasmin vāpi māse tu na kuryādyadi cotsavam /
GR14bhrgus_u:6061: eṣa eva vidhiḥ proktaḥ parasminvatsare kṛte // BhS_27.235 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6063: saptāhantu mahāśāntiṃ kṛtvā tūtsava mācaret // BhS_27.236 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6065: tatra devo na ramate yo 'sāvutsava daivatam // BhS_27.237 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6075: eṣa eva vidhirvṛddhau sa tu śreyo 'bhivṛddhidaḥ // BhS_27.242 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6079: akṛteṣu yathāśāstraṃ kṛtvā tantreṇa vaipunaḥ // BhS_27.244 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6087: na daivaṃ pratibadhnāti kāryaṃ yatkarma mānuṣam // BhS_27.248 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6091: grāmāntaraṃ prayāte tu dīkṣāmadhye padārthini // BhS_27.250 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6098: śrāddhakartiri no doṣa statra dātā bhavetsahi /
GR14bhrgus_u:6099: parānnena mukhaṃ dagdhaṃ hastau dagdhau pratigrahāt // BhS_27.254 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6101: dīkṣāmadhye nānyadīkṣāṃ garbhadīkṣāṃ vinā caret // BhS_27.255 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6102: vidhure yajamāne tu dīkṣitaḥ puruṣo bhavet /

GR14bhrgus_u:6107: vaidhuryasaṃbhave tveṣāṃ madhye duṣyanti naiva te // BhS_27.258 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6116: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca nṛsūktaṃ caiva gāruḍam /

GR14bhrgus_u:6118: vyāhṛtyantaṃ ca hutvā tu vaiṣṇavān pūjya cācaret /
GR14bhrgus_u:6119: dhvajasya lakṣaṇaṃ vakṣye yena mānena kārayet // BhS_27.264 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6121: pādenārdhena hīsaṃ vā pañcadhāpi prakalpayet // BhS_27.265 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6123: ardhahīnaṃ na kurvīta tadevāgatikaṃ bhavet // BhS_27.266 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6127: taṃ caturdaśadhā kuryāmmālāgre tena kārayet // BhS_27.268 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6133: sarvatra kiṅkiṇīnāṃ tu kuryācchatama śeṣataḥ // BhS_27.271 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6137: tridhā kṛte na kuryāttu ṣaḍaśraṃ śeṣamācaret // BhS_27.273 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6138: ādyaṃ bhāgaṃ tridhā kṛtvā kecidevaṃ prakurvate /
GR14bhrgus_u:6139: śikharaṃ śira ityāhurardhena śikharaṃ bhavet // BhS_27.274 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6143: viṣṭhādikaraṇe vāpi uṣite vā nirantaram // BhS_27.276 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6145: eṣa eva vidhiḥ prokto vimānaśikharādiṣu // BhS_27.277 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6155: śivadṛṣṭiṃ viṣṇuvṛṣṭhaṃ durgāyāḥ pārśvato dṛśam // BhS_27.282 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6161: atha vā śatadaṇḍāntaṃ tyaktvānve vasatiṃ jaguḥ // BhS_27.285 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6168: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi dhvajadaṇḍe tu niṣkṛtim /

GR14bhrgus_u:6170: abhagne vātha bhagne vā dhvajaṃ tatra pūnaḥ kṣipet /

GR14bhrgus_u:6173: bhagne dhvaje na sagrāhyastamapsu vidhinā tyajet // BhS_27.291 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6180: atha vā sudṛḍaṃ gṛhya pratiṣṭhāṃ mahatīṃ caret /
GR14bhrgus_u:6181: duṣṭaṃ bhāgaṃ vyapohyaiva pramāṇaṃ lakṣayetpunaḥ // BhS_27.295 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6183: saṃyutāṃ vardhitāṃ kuryādeṣa sārvatriko vidhiḥ // BhS_27.296 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6186: sthitameva dhvajaṃ kuryānna tu taṃ cālayetkvacit /
GR14bhrgus_u:6187: dagdhaṃ dhvajaṃ parityajya punaranyaṃ samāharet // BhS_27.298 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6190: patite vātyayā caivaṃ dhvajasya śikhare tathā /
GR14bhrgus_u:6191: mekhalāsu ca tatsarvaṃ navīkṛtya yathāvidhi // BhS_27.300 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6193: dhvajasya calane cāpi pramādādvraścane tathā // BhS_27.301 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6195: eṣa eva vidhiḥ prokto daṇḍeṣvanveṣu sarvataḥ // BhS_27.302 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6197: deve naṣṭe dhvaje susthe dhvajasyārādhanaṃ bhavet // BhS_27.303 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6200: tatra devo na ramate taddhvajaṃ tu tyajetsudhīḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:6201: atha vā yatra kutrāpi pratiṣṭhāpya samarcayet // BhS_27.305 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6205: tatsaṃdhau tu praśastaṃ syādyathā saṃphavamācaret // BhS_27.307 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6211: abhyantaraṃ bhaveccettu chidraṃ kuryāttu dṛkpathe // BhS_27.310 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6217: bālālayaṃ na tatra syādvāstuśuddhiṃ samācaret // BhS_27.313 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6220: uktena vidhinā yatra naṣṭe duṣṭe 'pi vā dhvaje /

GR14bhrgus_u:6228: utsavādau pravṛtte tu uktadoṣe tvayaṃ vidhiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:6233: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇudaivatyaṃ gāruḍaṃ dhvājameva ca // BhS_27.321 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6237: tatra dīpaṃ samāropya na labhetphalamavyayam // BhS_27.323 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6242: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca nṛsūktaṃ dhvājameva ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:6243: gāruḍaṃ daśaśo hutvā pratiṣṭhāṃ punarācaret // BhS_27.326 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6247: bherītāḍanahīne ca raudraṃ ca vyāhṛtīstathā // BhS_27.328 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6250: eṣa eva vidhiḥ proktaḥ prāyaścittaṃ samācaret /
GR14bhrgus_u:6251: āropite tu garuḍe hīne caiva nivedane // BhS_27.330 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6252: vaiṣṇavaṃ dhvaṃmetrau ca hutvā gāruḍameva ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:6254: mudgānne tu tathā hīne vaiṣṇavaṃ vāyudaivatam /
GR14bhrgus_u:6256: hutvā yatnena bahuśo maudgikaṃ ca nivedayet /
GR14bhrgus_u:6264: gāruḍaṃ dhvajamantraṃ ca sahastaṃ caiva hūyatām /
GR14bhrgus_u:6265: tataśśeṣaṃ samāpyeta viparītaṃ na kārayet // BhS_27.337 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6267: śāntiṃ pūrvoditāṃ kṛtvā pratiṣṭhāṃ punarācaret // BhS_27.338 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6271: apramāṇaṃ paṭaṃ gṛhya mahāśāntiṃ samācaret // BhS_27.340 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6273: hīne tu cotsavāraṃbhasnapane vaiṣṇavaṃ tathā // BhS_27.341 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6274: viṣṇusūktaṃ nṛsūktaṃ ca vāruṇaṃ caiva hūyate /
GR14bhrgus_u:6276: hīne kautukabandhe tu vaiṣṇavaṃ śāntameva ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:6277: saudarśanaṃ ca hutvā tu kautukaṃ bandhayetpunaḥ // BhS_27.343 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6279: vaiṣṇavaṃ pāvakaṃ bhūmidaivatyaṃ ca hunedbudhaḥ // BhS_27.344 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6283: prātarbaliṃ tu nirvāpya hīne nityotsave tathā // BhS_27.346 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6285: sāyaṃ kuryādutsavaṃ tu dviguṇaṃ kārayetkramāt // BhS_27.347 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6292: pūrvoktāṃ niṣkṛtiṃ kṛtvā dviguṇaṃ tu baliṃ dadet /
GR14bhrgus_u:6293: brahmaṇaśca digīśānāṃ balidānaṃ tu naityikam // BhS_27.351 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6294: adāne niṣkṛtiṃ kṛtvā pūrvoktaṃ ṣaḍguṇaṃ baliḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:6297: prathamaṃ vāstuśuddhissyādya vai dīyate baliḥ // BhS_27.353 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6301: antaśśace vāstuni tu na balibhramaṇaṃ caret // BhS_27.355 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6304: akāle tu baliṃ datvā kāle tu triguṇaṃ baliḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:6307: na hi śraddhotsave doṣamuśantyenaṃ sa hītaraḥ // BhS_27.358 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6310: kṛtvā sīmāṃ viniścitya tataḥ kāryaṃ samācaret /
GR14bhrgus_u:6313: devādīnāṃ balaṃ yasmādvardhate sa balissmṛtaḥ // BhS_27.361 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6322: pūrvoktāṃ niṣkṛtiṃ kṛtvā sarvatra dviguṇaṃ baliḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:6323: devatāvāhanaṃ yatra deśeprāk kriyate tataḥ // BhS_27.366 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6325: maṇḍalaṃ ca jalaṃ kūrcamāhvānādhāra ucyate // BhS_27.367 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6327: balidānaṃ tu guptaṃ syānna tatbaśyantyavaidikāḥ // BhS_27.368 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6331: balidravye 'tha vā pātre patite bhūtale tathā // BhS_27.370 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6332: bhinne naṣṭe ca pūrvoktaṃ hutvānyaṃ balimāharet /
GR14bhrgus_u:6333: balidānaṃ tu kṛtvaiva bhutapīṭhe kṣipettataḥ // BhS_27.371 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6334: baliśeṣamanukte tu sthāne buddhyā tu nirvapet /

GR14bhrgus_u:6395: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca nṛsūktaṃ sahitaṃ kramāt // BhS_27.402 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6416: ācāryādīnāṃ tu patane saṃkṣobhe ca tathākṛte /

GR14bhrgus_u:6418: dhvājaṃ ca vāruṇaṃ caiva vāyavyaṃ ca hunedvidhiḥ /

GR14bhrgus_u:6461: vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktaṃ ca nṛsūktaṃ ca tathaiva ca // BhS_27.435 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6474: kṣipraṃ vastreṇa saṃśodya mārjayitvā kuśena ca /

GR14bhrgus_u:6481: hutvā ca vāstu yajñeva pañcagavyaissamukṣya ca // BhS_28.7 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6889: tattadaṅgasamutpattiṃ yuktyā takṣṇā tu kārayet // BhS_29.13 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6909: devībhyāṃ sahitaṃ devaṃ daivikāṃśe vidhāya ca // BhS_29.23 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6915: kāṣṭhena pañjaraṃ kṛtvā bālāgāraṃ dṛḍhaṃ tataḥ // BhS_29.26 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6931: samādāya vidhānena mālikāyāṃ tu maṇḍape // BhS_29.34 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6937: paścācca varṇalepādīn kṛtvā saṃśodya caivahi // BhS_29.37 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6939: kuṃbhaṃ biṃbaṃ samādāya praviśyābhyantaraṃ tataḥ // BhS_29.38 //

GR14bhrgus_u:6949: paścāttale tu nirduṣṭe kautukādīn pragṛhya ca // BhS_29.43 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6962: vāruṇaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ caiva prakṣipyaiva ca tajjale /

GR14bhrgus_u:6965: devyādīnāṃ parṣadāṃ ca tattanmantraṃ savaiṣṇavam // BhS_29.51 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6968: mahāṅgāni śiraḥ kukṣi vakṣaḥ kaṇṭhān pracakṣate /

GR14bhrgus_u:6973: tatropāṅgasya hīne tu kuṃbhaṃ saṃsādhya pūrvavat // BhS_29.55 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6974: āvāhya kuṃbhe tacchaktiṃ biṃbaṃ saṃdhāya pūrvavat /
GR14bhrgus_u:6975: kṛtvā jalādhivāsādīn vāstuhomaṃ vidhāya ca // BhS_29.56 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6985: bhūmau pidhāya tadberaṃ tadūrdhve juhuyātkramāt // BhS_29.61 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6987: uddhṛtya biṃbaṃ prakṣālya pañcagavyaiḥ kuśodakaiḥ // BhS_29.62 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6992: paṭe kuḍye 'tha vā likhya bere vidhivadarcite /
GR14bhrgus_u:6995: ācāryeṇa ca yenādau karṣaṇādyāḥ kṛtāḥ kriyāḥ // BhS_29.66 //
GR14bhrgus_u:6998: tadabhāve ca tatputraṃ pautraṃ naptārameva ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:7002: bhavecca niṣphalā pūjā sarvaṃ kāryaṃ vinaśyati /
GR14bhrgus_u:7005: abjānale mahāśāntiṃ hutvā saṃprārthyavai gurum // BhS_29.71 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7013: pūrvaṃ tu yogamārgeṇa pratiṣṭhāpyārcite punaḥ // BhS_29.75 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7014: devībhyāṃ saha paścāttu kārayet sthāpanaṃ yadi /
GR14bhrgus_u:7019: sthānake cāsanaṃ kuryācchayanaṃ vāpi cecchayā // BhS_29.78 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7021: śayane nāsanaṃ caiva sthānakaṃ kārayedvidhiḥ // BhS_29.79 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7024: snapanaṃ baliberaṃ ca sthitaṃ sarvatra kārayet /
GR14bhrgus_u:7029: hutvā tu mahatīṃ śāntiṃ yathāsthāne tu sthāpayet /
GR14bhrgus_u:7035: saṃkṣobho jāyate sadyo vināśo bhavati dhruvam /
GR14bhrgus_u:7038: saṃpūjya vaiṣṇavān śaktyādatvā vai bhūridakṣiṇām // BhS_29.87 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7040: saptāhaṃ tu mahāśāntiṃ hutvā vipraśataṃ tathā // BhS_29.88 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7042: ṣaṇmāse samatīte tu ramate tatra nohariḥ // BhS_29.89 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7079: teṣu garbhakṛhe caiva pīṭhe caiva bhavāni tu /
GR14bhrgus_u:7082: prāsādajāni rājñāṃ syuḥ prāsāde 'pi viśeṣataḥ // BhS_29.109 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7083: adhiṣṭhāne ca pāde ca prastare ca gale 'pi ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:7084: śikhare ca bhavāni syuḥkṣatriyāṇāṃ krameṇa tu // BhS_29.110 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7092: rudrālaye tu sarveṣāṃ nṛpasya tu guhālaye // BhS_29.114 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7111: bhaumeṣu tu careṣvatra nimittaṃ ca nimittinam /
GR14bhrgus_u:7113: sthireṣu pratimānāṃ tu rodane hasane tathā /
GR14bhrgus_u:7114: jvalane ca tathā devaṃ saṃsthāpya taruṇālaye // BhS_29.125 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7116: śāntiṃ kṛtvā punaḥ kuryātthsāpanaṃ cārcanaṃ kramāt // BhS_29.126 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7118: svede ca rudhirasrāve sarvaṃ rodanavaccaret // BhS_29.127 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7128: ālipya śarkarāṃ kuryāc chāntiṃ divyapracoditām // BhS_29.132 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7136: veśmāntaraṃ vāsayitvā śāntiṃ kṛtvā yathocitām // BhS_29.136 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7143: parvatāgre taṭākasya tīre vā maṇḍapaṃ prapām /
GR14bhrgus_u:7149: khanitvaiva cat prācyāṃ dvihastāyata vistṛtam // BhS_29.142 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7158: sthaṇḍile dhānyarāśiṃ tu kṛtvā tasya ca madhyame /
GR14bhrgus_u:7160: sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ tāmraṃ kṛṇmayaṃ vā svaśaktitaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:7163: vastrayugmena saṃveṣṭya bhūṣaṇaiśca vibhūṣya ca // BhS_29.149 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7166: ratnāni hema rajataṃ tāmraṃ kāṃsyaṃ tathā trapu /
GR14bhrgus_u:7175: madhye sūryaṃ tathendrādi bhārgavāṅgārakau tathā // BhS_29.155 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7187: hutvānte tu ghṛtenaiva vaiṣṇavaṃ viṣṇusūktakam // BhS_29.161 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7193: yadi devālaye doṣaḥ kuṃbhapārśvetha sthaṇḍile // BhS_29.164 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7194: devaṃ taṃ sthāpya cābhyarchya nivedya ca mahāhaviḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:7198: bhaumeṣu tatthsalaṃ prākṣya śiṣṭatoyena vai nṛpam /
GR14bhrgus_u:7199: tatpatnīṃ cābhiṣiñcecca guruṃ saṃpūjya pārthivaḥ // BhS_29.167 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7201: dakṣiṇāṃ bahulāṃ dadyājjīvo yajñasya dakṣiṇā // BhS_29.168 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7204: kuṃbhasya sādhanaṃ kṛtvā saptāhānte prabhuṃ tathā /
GR14bhrgus_u:7209: eṣa eva vidhiḥ prokto gṛhiṇāmapi sammataḥ // BhS_29.172 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7217: hemapātre tu sannyasya devamāvāhya tatra ca // BhS_29.176 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7218: abhyarcya tasya cordhvetu pīṭhe kuṃbhaṃ nidhāya ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:7219: kuṃbhamūle tu suṣiraṃ sūcīmātraṃ vidhāya ca // BhS_29.177 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7231: evaṃ jñātvā vidhānena tattatkarmasu gauravam // BhS_29.183 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7233: dine dine pūrayitvā kuṃbhaṃ tenaiva secayet // BhS_29.184 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7236: atha vā varṣa kāmī vā mokṣārthī paśukāmanaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:7243: śvabhrāddakṣiṇataḥ kṛtvā kuṇḍaṃ śrāmaṇakasya tu // BhS_29.189 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7244: agnimādhāya kuṃbhāṃ stu nava saṃveṣṭya tantunā /
GR14bhrgus_u:7245: adbhiḥ prakṣālya cotpūya kuśakūrcena cātvaraḥ // BhS_29.190 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7251: tantunā veṣṭite kṣīraṃ kṛhītvākarake pūnaḥ // BhS_29.193 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7257: atha vā snapanaṃ yāvattāvadudvartya mantrataḥ // BhS_29.196 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7263: dhruvaberārcane cettu saṃsnāpya pramukhe ghaṭam // BhS_29.199 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7271: kuṃbhaṃ saṃsādhya ca prāgvatsaptāhānte viśeṣataḥ // BhS_29.203 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7275: mahāśāntikramaṃ vakṣye vinā kuṃbhasya sādhanam // BhS_29.205 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7283: atha śuddhividhiṃ vakṣye vāstuhomaṃ hunettataḥ // BhS_29.209 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7289: arthabandhuvināśe ca durbhikṣe ca parājaye // BhS_29.212 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7292: saptāhaṃ vā navāhaṃ vā dvādaśārṇena vai pṛthak /
GR14bhrgus_u:7293: aṣṭottara sahasraṃ tu juhuyādvidhinā kramāt // BhS_29.214 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7294: iti śrīvaikhānase bhagavacchāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ sihitāyāṃ prakīrṇādhikāre ekonatriṃśo 'dhyaḥ.
GR14bhrgus_u:7301: padmāvale vaiṣṇavaṃ ca viṣṇusūktaṃ ca pauruṣam /
GR14bhrgus_u:7306: vaikhānasaṃ pañcarātraṃ vaidikaṃ tāntrikaṃ kramāt // BhS_30.5 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7312: saumyaṃ sarvatra saṃpūjyaṃ grāmādiṣu viśeṣataḥ // BhS_30.8 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7313: brāhmaṇānāṃ ca geheṣu saumye nai vārcayeddharim /
GR14bhrgus_u:7316: viprāvāse janāvāse naiva kuryādanena tu // BhS_30.10 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7317: saumye vaikhānase mārge yadyāgne yena saṃkaraḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:7318: pañcarātreṇa saṃprāpto rājā rāṣṭraṃ vinaśyati // BhS_30.11 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7320: mahāśāntiṃ vidhānena saptāhaṃ vā tṣahantu vā // BhS_30.12 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7322: abhyarcya devadeveśaṃ saṃpūjyaiva tu vaiṣṇavān // BhS_30.13 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7330: pratiṣṭhāpya tadārabhya sarvaṃ tenaiva cācaret // BhS_30.17 //

GR14bhrgus_u:7344: na hi tatkāraṇaṃ lebhe vedavismaraṇaṃ tu yat // BhS_30.24 //

GR14bhrgus_u:7376: namaste viṣṇave tubhyaṃ puruṣāya namo namaḥ // BhS_30.40 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7387: mātā tvaṃ me pitā tvaṃ me bhrātā tvaṃ me sakhāmama /
GR14bhrgus_u:7388: sarvaṃ tvamasi viśvātmaṃstvayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam // BhS_30.46 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7390: tvāmeva śaraṇaṃ pāpya nistaranti manīṣiṇaḥ // BhS_30.47 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7391: na hi te gopya te kiñcinna hyantyaviditaṃ tava /
GR14bhrgus_u:7392: tvaṃ sākṣī dehināmekassarvaṃ vyāpya tvamedhase // BhS_30.48 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7393: na te rūpaṃ na karaṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ nāsti te 'nagha /

GR14bhrgus_u:7396: tvatto me mānasaṃ janma prathamaṃ dvijapūjitam // BhS_30.50 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7397: vijñānaṃ tadidaṃ prāptaṃ brahmatvaṃ ca yadārjitam /
GR14bhrgus_u:7398: sarvaṃ tava kaṭākṣasya leśo 'yaṃ madhusūdana // BhS_30.51 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7400: avedavihitassargo mayā kartuṃ na śakyate // BhS_30.52 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7408: sa vibhuḥ procyate brahmā vikhanā brahmavādibhiḥ // BhS_30.56 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7414: dakṣaṃ marīcinaṃ nīlalohitaṃ bhṛgumena ca // BhS_30.59 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7418: vedānāṃ vyasanādarpāk prāgrūpaṃ militaṃ tu yat // BhS_30.61 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7420: nāmnā vikhanasaṃ prāhuryaṃ ca śātātapaṃ tathā // BhS_30.62 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7422: tathā vasiṣṭhodakṣaśca nava brahmāṇar iritā // BhS_30.63 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7427: ke cidgṛhyāṇi vai cakrurgṛhyaśrautātmakāni tu // BhS_30.65 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7428: dharmaśāstrāṇi kecittu purāṇāni ca ke cana /
GR14bhrgus_u:7431: vāṅmayaṃ sakalaṃ sarvaṃ śāstrabaddhaṃ pracakrire // BhS_30.67 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7435: cakre ṛgādibhedaistu vyasitvā tu pṛthak pṛthak // BhS_30.69 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7436: ādikāle tu bhagavān brahmātu vikhanā muniḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:7441: vede vaikhānase sūtre yo dharmaḥ parikīrtitaḥ // BhS_30.72 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7451: yathā vedeṣu sarveṣu sāmavedaḥ praśasyate // BhS_30.77 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7455: adhīteṣu ca vedeṣu sāṃgeṣu labhate phalam // BhS_30.79 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7458: te sarve sūtramāśritya cainaṃ gacchanti mādhavam /
GR14bhrgus_u:7463: yasminneva tu saṃprokte sūtre vikhanasā purā // BhS_30.83 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7467: kiṃ bahūktena vidhinā sarvaṃ vaikhānasaṃ jagat // BhS_30.85 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7469: tadvaikhānaḥ paraṃ brahma iti vedādadhīmahi // BhS_30.86 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7479: dvijeṣu brāhmāṇāśśreṣṭhā brāhmaṇeṣu ca caiṣṇavāḥ // BhS_30.91 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7481: vaiṣṇavīṃ pratimāṃ loke vipraṃ vaikhānasaṃ tathā // BhS_30.92 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7482: gaṅgāṃ viṣṇupadīṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate mūlamasyāpi śāstrasya /
GR14bhrgus_u:7483: sārdhakoṭipramāṇataḥ upādiśatsa bhagavān asmabhyaṃ naimiśe vane // BhS_30.93 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7486: pūjānte snapanānte ca tathānte cotsavasya ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:7490: tīrthaṃ gṛhītuṃ prathamcchetsa patati dhruvam yaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:7497: tatpūjā niṣphalā ca syādrājarāṣṭraṃ vinaśyati // BhS_30.100 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7498: ṣaṭkālaṃ vā trikālaṃ vā dvikālaṃ kālameva vā /
GR14bhrgus_u:7499: ālaye bhagavatpūjā saumyena vidhinā kṛtā // BhS_30.101 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7501: tatrārcane tu śuddhātmā pūjakaḥ paritoṣitaḥ // BhS_30.102 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7502: tena rājā ca rājyaṃ ca yajamānaśca nānvayaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:7506: phalaṃ vṛkṣasya rājānaḥ puṣpaṃ vṛkṣasya pūjakāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:7508: devasyaṃ brāhmaṇasvaṃ ca sanmānaṃ pūjakasya ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:7509: yastu na trāyate rājā tamāhurbrahmaghātukam // BhS_30.106 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7511: anyāyaiḥ paribhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ pārthivo gatiḥ // BhS_30.107 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7512: rājā pitā ca mātā ca rājā ca paramo guruḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:7513: rājā ca sarvabhūtānāṃ paritrātā gururmataḥ // BhS_30.108 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7517: rājā dahati diḍena vipro dahati manyuvā // BhS_30.110 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7522: āpadyapi ca kaṣṭāyāṃ nāvamānyo hi pūjakaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:7523: arcakena tu tuṣṭena yaduktaṃ devasannidhau // BhS_30.113 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7524: tadvākyaṃ tu ha rervākyaṃ nāvamānyo hi pūjakaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:7525: arcakaṃ kopayedyastu sa hi devasya kopakṛt // BhS_30.114 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7527: gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ tathā mālyaṃ tāṃbūlaṃ cākṣatādikam // BhS_30.115 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7533: nānyaṃ devaṃ namaskuryānnānyaṃ devaṃ prapūjayet // BhS_30.118 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7535: kāyena manasā vācā sa tu vaiṣṇava ucyate // BhS_30.119 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7539: avaiṣṇavasya pūjā tu teṣāmagre sudāruṇā // BhS_30.121 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7545: kartṛṣu brahmaviduṣo ye hi bhaktājanākdane // BhS_30.124 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7547: tasmātsaṃpūjya sarvādau bhaktyā vaikhānasaṃ dvijam // BhS_30.125 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7551: na hi sādhāraṇi sṛṣyirvaiṣṇavīti vicintayet // BhS_30.127 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7553: narāṇāṃ kṣīṇapāpānāṃ kṛṣṇe bhaktiḥ prajāyate // BhS_30.128 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7555: draṣṭuṃ vā śakyate mūḍhāḥ praveṣṭuṃ kuta eva hi // BhS_30.129 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7557: bhavantivai bhāgavatāste viṣṇuṃ praviśanti ca // BhS_30.130 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7559: vārṣiṇe jāyate puṃsāṃ govindābhimukhī matiḥ // BhS_30.131 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7560: pradveṣaṃ yāti govinde dvijān vedāṃśca nindati /
GR14bhrgus_u:7565: viṣṭau ca yajñapuruṣe śraddhā bhavati niścalā // BhS_30.134 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7567: bhavanti te bhāgavatā niśśreyaśaparā narāḥ // BhS_30.135 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7571: bhāvasaktaśca govinde viṣṇau bhāgavato hi saḥ // BhS_30.137 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7573: na drogdhā paravittādeḥ sahi bhāgavataḥ smṛtaḥ // BhS_30.138 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7574: sarvān devān hariṃ vetti sarvān lokāṃśca keśavam /
GR14bhrgus_u:7575: tebhyaśca nāsyamātmāvaṃ sa hi bhāgavatassmṛtaḥ // BhS_30.139 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7579: yo na jānāti puṇyātmā sa hi bhāgavatassmṛtaḥ // BhS_30.141 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7581: iti yo vai vijānāti sa hi bhāgavatassmṛtaḥ // BhS_30.142 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7584: bhāvaṃ na kurute yastu sarvabhūteṣu pāpakam /
GR14bhrgus_u:7585: karmaṇā manasā vācā sa tu bhāgavatassmṛtaḥ // BhS_30.144 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7587: bhāvena niṣpādayati jñeyo bhāgavato hi saḥ // BhS_30.145 //
GR14bhrgus_u:7591: tāṃ gatiṃ na narāyānti yāṃ tu bhāgavatā narāḥ // BhS_30.147 //

GR14bhrgus_u:8054: om ham lam ram yam? likhitvā,
GR14bhrgus_u:8056: om na ma ssu dar śa nā ya iti vilikhya,

GR14bhrgus_u:8061: dalasaṃdhau om hum na mo bha ga va te va jra va rā hā ya svā hā iti vilikhya,

GR14bhrgus_u:8066: lam ram ham ṣam vam yam sam śam iti bījaṃ likhitvā,

GR14bhrgus_u:8451: grāme vā nagare vāpi śāstrokte sumanorame // BhS_34.65 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8457: manuṣyāḥ puṇyakarmāṇastatra tatra dine dine // BhS_34.68 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8469: yatra vā dṛśyate bhedo bhagavacchāstraśilpayoḥ // BhS_34.74 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8481: gṛhaṃ ca cititulyaṃ syādyatra nārādhyate hariḥ // BhS_34.80 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8483: bhuṅkte sa yāti narakān sūkareṣvasi jāyate // BhS_34.81 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8485: tasyānnaṃ naiva bhoktavyamabhakṣyeṇa samaṃ hi tat // BhS_34.82 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8491: yathā ca parame vyomni sannidhatte tathā hariḥ // BhS_34.85 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8493: sādhyā vidyādharā yakṣāssarvā vai devayonayaḥ // BhS_34.86 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8495: vāyurvāti sukhaṃ tatra sūryastapati tejasā // BhS_34.87 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8497: bhūmissasyavatī ca syātprasannaṃ ca nabho bhavet // BhS_34.88 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8500: na vyādhijaṃ bhayaṃ kiṃ cinnāpi jvarakṛtaṃ tathā /
GR14bhrgus_u:8501: na vyālajaṃ bhayaṃ vāpi bhavedatrana saṃśayaḥ // BhS_34.90 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8502: nopaplavo nṛpāṇāṃ vā mṛgāṇāṃ vāpyapāṃ bhavet /
GR14bhrgus_u:8505: āgnihotrāśca hūyante tapyante 'tra tapāṃsi ca // BhS_34.92 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8508: prākṛtaṃ yo vadenmūḍhassa yāti narakaṃ dhruvam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8516: svarṇasteye ca yatpāpaṃ surāpāne ca yadbhavet /
GR14bhrgus_u:8521: tasmin deśe viśeṣeṇa sarvebhāgavatā harau // BhS_34.100 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8523: na hi sarvo 'pi sarvatra svayaṃvyaktasthalādikam // BhS_34.101 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8529: tasmādaprākṛtaṃ deśaṃ na brūyātprākṛtaṃ naraḥ // BhS_34.104 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8530: na ca sāmānyabhāvena taṃ paśyedyadi paśyati /
GR14bhrgus_u:8531: naśyatyeva na saṃdeha iti śāstraviniścayaḥ // BhS_34.105 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8532: iti śrīvaikhānase bhagavacchāstre bhṛguproktāyāṃ sahitāyāṃ prakīrṇādhikāre catustriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ.
GR14bhrgus_u:8540: kulānāṃ śatamāgāmi samatītaṃ tathā śatam // BhS_35.3 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8542: saptajanmakṛtaṃ pāpamalpaṃ vā yadi vā bahu // BhS_35.4 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8546: praśastadeśe bhūbhāge yo naro bhavanaṃ hareḥ // BhS_35.6 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8550: pratimāṃ lakṣaṇavatīṃ yaḥ kārayati mānavaḥ // BhS_35.8 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8552: ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣasahasrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi sa mogate // BhS_35.9 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8554: tataḥ prayāti vaikuṇṭhaṃ nissamābhyadhikaṃ mahaḥ // BhS_35.10 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8556: puruṣaḥ kṛtakṛtyatvānnainaṃ śvo maraṇaṃ tapet // BhS_35.11 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8557: ye bhaviṣyanti ye 'tītā ākalpāḥ puruṣāḥ kule /
GR14bhrgus_u:8558: tāṃstārayati saṃsthāpya devasya pratiyāṃ hareḥ // BhS_35.12 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8564: nājñābhaṅgaṃ kariṣyanti bhavatāṃ jantavaḥ kvacit // BhS_35.15 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8568: pūjayanti sadā viṣṇuṃ te vastyājyāḥ sudūrataḥ // BhS_35.17 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8569: yastiṣṭhan yassvapan bhuñjan uttiṣṭhan skhaliteṣu ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:8572: nāvalokyā bhavadbhiste tattejo hanti vau gatim // BhS_35.19 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8574: arcayanti na te grāhyānarāḥ kṛṣṇāśrayoddhatāḥ // BhS_35.20 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8586: yaṃ yaṃ kāmayate kāmaṃ taṃ tamāpnotyasaṃśayam // BhS_35.26 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8589: karoti kṣudhitānāṃ ca bhojyāṃ pākakriyāṃ śikhī /
GR14bhrgus_u:8597: ahanyahani yatpāpaṃ kurute viṣayī naraḥ // BhS_35.31 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8599: sabāhyābhyantaraṃ tasya kāyo niṣkalmaṣo bhavet // BhS_35.32 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8603: udakābhyukṣaṇaṃ viṣṇoryaḥ karoti satā gṛhe // BhS_35.34 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8615: tasya puṇyaphalaṃ vaktuṃ nālaṃ devāssahānugāḥ // BhS_35.40 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8619: tasminvimāne sa narastsrī vā tiṣṭhati śobhane // BhS_35.42 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8622: liptā ca yāvatā hastā viṣṇorāyatane mahī /
GR14bhrgus_u:8626: tat kṣayādiha cāgatya viśiṣṭe jāyate kule /
GR14bhrgus_u:8635: na tasyajāyate bhaṅgo gārhasthye tu kadā ca na // BhS_35.50 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8637: nāpnoti sāpi vaidhavyaṃ gṛhabhaṅgaṃ kadā ca na // BhS_35.51 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8643: so 'pi lokaṃ samāsādya modatevai śatakratoḥ // BhS_35.54 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8645: upalipte naro datvā na durgatimavāpnuyāt // BhS_35.55 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8655: tān lokān puruṣā yāntikṣīrasnānakarā hareḥ // BhS_35.60 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8660: yathā ca vimalaṃ kṣīraṃ yathā nirvṛtikārakam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8665: yassnāpayati devasya ghṛtena pratimāṃ hareḥ // BhS_35.65 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8666: indraprasthe dvijāgṣāṇāṃ sa dadāti gavāṃ śatam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8667: gavāṃ śatasya viprāṇāṃ na dattasya bhavetphalam // BhS_35.66 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8669: purā rājarṣibhiḥ prāptā saptadvīpā vasundharā // BhS_35.67 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8671: pratimāsaṃ sitāṣṭamyāṃ ghṛtena jagataḥ patim // BhS_35.68 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8673: dvādaśyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ ca gavyena haviṣā hareḥ // BhS_35.69 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8675: jñānato 'jñānato vāpi yatpāpaṃ kurute naraḥ // BhS_35.70 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8678: sa gatvāvaiṣṇavaṃ dhāma modate saha sūribhiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8679: srajaṃ baddhvā sumanasāṃ yaḥ prayacchati viṣṇave // BhS_35.72 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8687: upānahau pāduke ca vāhanaṃ yānameva ca // BhS_35.76 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8690: sa vimānaṃ tu dutprāpaṃ prāpno tyeva na saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.77 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8693: sāmīpyaṃ sahasā viṣṇoryāti sadyo sa saṃśayaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8694: dhvajaṃ ca vādyamutpādya viṣṇusātkurute tu yaḥ // BhS_35.79 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8696: dāsīdāsaṃ tathātmāna mātmīyaṃ ca prayacchali // BhS_35.80 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8702: dīpaṃ prayacchati naro viṣṇorāyatane hi yaḥ // BhS_35.83 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8708: jātismaratvaṃ prajñāṃ ca prākāśyaṃ sarvavantuṣu // BhS_35.86 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8710: sarvakālaṃ ca cakṣuṣmān medhāvī dīpado naraḥ // BhS_35.87 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8711: jāyate narakaṃ cāpi tamassaṃjñaṃ na paśyati /
GR14bhrgus_u:8717: kurvīta dīpahartāca mūkū'ndho jāyate jaḍaḥ // BhS_35.90 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8723: idānīṃ yātanā bhaugāḥkiṃ vilāpaḥ kariṣyati // BhS_35.93 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8725: etatkona vijānāti yena yūyaṃ pramādinaḥ // BhS_35.94 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8733: na vo vilapite kiṃ cididānīṃ dṛśyate phalam // BhS_35.98 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8740: yadbhūyo 'pi matiḥ pāpe na kartavyā kathaṃ ca na /
GR14bhrgus_u:8745: haviṣāṃ pāyasādīnāṃ haraye ca nivedanāt // BhS_35.104 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8761: taṭākānāṃ ca vakṣyāmi kṛtānāṃ cāpi ye guṇāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8762: triṣu lokeṣu sarvatra pūjanīyaḥ pratāpavān // BhS_35.112 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8768: taṭākāni ca sarvāṇi diśanti śriyamuttamām // BhS_35.115 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8770: sthāvarāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃśrayanti jalāśayam // BhS_35.116 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8773: varṣākāle taṭāke tu salilaṃ yasya tiṣṭhati /
GR14bhrgus_u:8775: śaratkā le tu salilaṃ taṭāke yasya tiṣṭhati /
GR14bhrgus_u:8778: sa vai bahusuvarṇasya yajñasya labhate phalam // BhS_35.120 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8779: yasya vai śaiśire kāle taṭāke salilaṃ bhavet /
GR14bhrgus_u:8782: atirātrasya yajñasya phalaṃ sa samupāśnute // BhS_35.122 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8784: vājimedhapalaṃ tasya phalaṃ vai munayo viduḥ // BhS_35.123 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8785: sa kulaṃ tārayetsarvaṃ yasya khāte jalāśaye /
GR14bhrgus_u:8786: gāvaḥ pibanti salilaṃ sādhavaśca narāssadā // BhS_35.124 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8787: taṭāke yasya gāvastu pibanti tṛṣitā jalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8791: durlabhaṃ salilaṃ ceha viśeṣeṇa paratra vai /
GR14bhrgus_u:8794: tasya puṇyaphalaṃ vaktuṃ nālaṃ devāssahānu gāḥ // BhS_35.128 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8796: snātvā kurvanti karmāṇi tasya nākesthitirbhavet // BhS_35.129 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8798: tasya lokā bhavantyeva pāvanāḥ kṣativarjitāḥ // BhS_35.130 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8802: sthānarāṇāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ jātayaṣṣaṭ prakīrtitāḥ // BhS_35.132 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8804: etā jātyastu vṛkṣāṇāṃ teṣāṃ rope guṇāstvime // BhS_35.133 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8805: kīrtiśca mānave loke pretya caiva phalaṃ śubham /
GR14bhrgus_u:8806: labhate nāma loke ca pitṛbhiśca mahīyate // BhS_35.134 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8810: tasya putrā bhavantyete pādapā nātra saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.136 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8812: puṣpaissuragaṇān vṛkṣāḥ phalaiścāpi tathā pitṛn // BhS_35.137 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8818: patraṃ phalaṃ vā puṣpaṃ vā yasyārāme 'varopite // BhS_35.140 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8820: patraiḥphalair vāpuṣpairvā prīyate bhagavān hariḥ // BhS_35.141 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8824: ete svarge mahīyante ye cānye satyavādinaḥ // BhS_35.143 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8826: yajecca vividhairyajñaissatyaṃ ca satataṃ vadet // BhS_35.144 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8830: acalā hyakṣayo bhūmissarvān kāmān prayacchati // BhS_35.146 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8832: tasyaihikaṃ bhavetpuṇyaṃ tathā pāratrikaṃ bahu // BhS_35.147 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8837: brahmārpaṇadhiyā yastu guptaṃ dāsyati kiṃ cana /
GR14bhrgus_u:8840: yaṃ yaṃ kāmaṃ tu manasi kṛtvā yadyacca yor'payet // BhS_35.151 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8846: sarvameva bhaveddattaṃ vasudhāṃ yaḥ prayacchati // BhS_35.154 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8854: sa śatānyeva gokarṇamiti vedavido vidaḥ // BhS_35.158 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8858: evaṃ bhūmikṛtaṃ dānaṃ sasye sasye prarohati // BhS_35.160 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8862: evaṃ dattāciraṃ kālaṃ bhūmirbharati bhūmidam // BhS_35.162 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8864: yo dadāti naraśreṣṭhassa na pracyavate divaḥ // BhS_35.163 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8870: gandharvāpsaraso yatra tatra tiṣṭhanti bhūmidāḥ // BhS_35.166 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8873: yasya yasya yadā bhūmi stasya tasya tadā phalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8874: bhūmiṃ yaḥ pratigṛhṇāti yaśca bhūmiṃ prayacchati // BhS_35.168 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8880: punaśca janma saṃpāpya bhavedbhūmi patirdhruvam // BhS_35.171 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8881: yathā bhūmissadā devī dātāraṃ kurute patim /
GR14bhrgus_u:8884: mahīṃ dadatpavitrassyātpuṇyā ca jagatī yataḥ // BhS_35.173 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8891: yathā janitrī kṣīreṇa puṣṇāti svasutaṃ mudā /
GR14bhrgus_u:8894: na tatphalamavāpnoti yaddatvā vasudhāṃ punaḥ // BhS_35.178 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8896: ghorāśca vāruṇāḥ pāśā nopasarpanti bhūmidam // BhS_35.179 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8899: ādityā iva dīpyante tejasā di mānavāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8900: ye prayacchanti vasudhāṃ haraye lokasākṣiṇe // BhS_35.181 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8905: sa naḥ kulasya puruṣassano bandhussano guruḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:8906: sa dātā sa ca vikrānto yo dadāti vasuṃdharām // BhS_35.184 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8910: dhenuṃ datvā suvratāṃ ca sopadhānāṃ payasvinīm // BhS_35.186 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8912: devadevasya tuṣṭyarthaṃ devāya brāhmaṇāya vā // BhS_35.187 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8913: na tasya śakyate vaktuṃ phalaṃ varṣaśatairapi /
GR14bhrgus_u:8915: tāvadvarṣa sahasrāṇi kāmān duhyeta sā varā /
GR14bhrgus_u:8918: sā gauḥ kāmadughā bhūtvā dātāramupasarpati // BhS_35.190 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8920: parāṃ vṛddhiṃśriyaṃ prāpya svargaloke mahīyate // BhS_35.191 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8922: gacchetsukṛtināṃ lokān gāvo datvā yathāvidhi // BhS_35.192 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8924: tasyāpi cākṣayā lokā bhavantīha paratra ca // BhS_35.193 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8925: yo vā dyūte dhanaṃ jitvāgāvaḥkrītvā prayacchati /
GR14bhrgus_u:8928: sa gatvā durlabhaṃ sthānamamaraissaha modate // BhS_35.195 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8930: sa gatvā virajān lokān sukhaṃ vasati devavat // BhS_35.196 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8934: tamaḥ praviśate datvā dvijaṃ kleśena yojayet // BhS_35.198 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8936: yuñjyātlkeśaistu yo vipraṃ datvaināṃ tadvṛdhā bhavet // BhS_35.199 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8937: yuvānaṃ balinaṃ śyāmaṃ halena saha yūthapam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8939: brāhmaṇānāṃ gavāṃ caiva kulamekaṃ dvidhā kṛtam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8940: ekatra mantrā stiṣṭhanti havirekatra tiṣṭhati // BhS_35.201 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8948: tulyaprabhāvā devaiste modante psarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ // BhS_35.205 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8952: yathaiva salile matsyassalilena sahoṣya te // BhS_35.207 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8956: tānu dattāsu loke 'smin kiṃ na dattaṃ bhavediha // BhS_35.209 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8959: suvarṇaṃ paramaṃ dānaṃ suvarṇaṃ dakṣiṇā parā /
GR14bhrgus_u:8962: apipāpaśataṃ kṛtvā dattaṃ vipriṣu tārayet // BhS_35.212 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8967: agnyabhāve ca kurvanti vahnisthāne ca kāñcanam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8979: na hyataḥ paramaṃ loke sadyaḥ pāpavināśanam /
GR14bhrgus_u:8980: brahmakośasya śuddhasya suvarṇaṃ yaḥ prayacchati // BhS_35.221 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8982: iti saṃkṣepataḥ proktaṃ svarṇadānaphalaṃ mayā // BhS_35.222 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8984: viṣṇave ca śriyai bhūmyai sarvadevebhya eva ca // BhS_35.223 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8986: na śakyate phalaṃ tasya vaktuṃ varṣaśatairapi // BhS_35.224 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8992: lokatantraṃ hi saṃjñāśca sarvamanne pratiṣṭhitam // BhS_35.227 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8993: annena sadṛśaṃ dānaṃ na bhūto na bhaviṣyati /
GR14bhrgus_u:8996: annena dhāryate sarvaṃ viśvaṃ jagadidaṃ mahat // BhS_35.229 //
GR14bhrgus_u:8998: annādbhavanti vai prāṇāḥ pratyakṣaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.230 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9006: annadaḥ prāpnute bhū yo bhuvi ceha ca yatsukham // BhS_35.234 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9008: api śvapāke śuni vā na dānaṃ vipraṇaśyati // BhS_35.235 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9014: brāhmaṇāya viśeṣeṇa na sa pāpena muhyate // BhS_35.238 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9016: annadāmapi śūdre ca brāhmaṇasya viśiṣyate // BhS_35.239 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9022: asmākamapi putro vā pautro vānnaṃ pradāsyati // BhS_35.242 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9024: akāmovā sakāmo vā datvā puṇyamavāpnuyāt // BhS_35.243 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9026: viprā yamadhigacchanti bhikṣamāṇā gṛhaṃ sadā // BhS_35.244 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9028: mahābhoge kule pretya janma cāpnoti nityaśaḥ // BhS_35.245 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9030: nityaṃ mṛṣṭānnadāyī tu svarge vasati satkṛtaḥ // BhS_35.246 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9032: annadaḥ paśumān putrī dhanavān bhogavānapi // BhS_35.247 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9034: annadaḥprāṇado loke sarvadaḥ procyate tu saḥ // BhS_35.248 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9038: upyate yatra tadbījaṃ taddhi puṇyaphalaṃ mahat // BhS_35.250 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9044: annaṃ bhuvaṃ divaṃ khaṃ ca sarvamanne pratiṣṭhitam // BhS_35.253 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9045: anna praṇāśe bhidyante śarīre pañca dhātavaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9048: nivartante viśeṣeṇa brahma cātra pradīyate // BhS_35.255 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9050: triṣulokeṣu dharmārthamannaṃ deyaṃ tato budhaiḥ // BhS_35.256 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9052: āyuśca vardhate tadvatteṣu lokeṣu niścitam // BhS_35.257 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9054: yacca meghagataṃ vāri śakro varṣati harṣitaḥ // BhS_35.258 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9057: tadyathā meghato vāri patitaṃ bhavati kṣitau /
GR14bhrgus_u:9058: tadā vasumatī devī snigdhā bhavati bhāvitā // BhS_35.260 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9062: agniṣṭomau hi tacchrakraṃ sṛjataḥ puṣyataśca ha // BhS_35.262 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9064: eka eva smṛto rāśistato bhūtāni jaṅgire // BhS_35.263 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9068: bhavanāni prakāśante divi teṣāṃ mahātmanām // BhS_35.265 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9075: vāpyo vīthyaḥ sabhāḥ kūpādīrghi kāścaiva sarvaśaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9078: kṣīraṃ sravanti saritastathā caivānna parvatāḥ // BhS_35.270 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9082: haviḥpātrādi sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ tāmrameva vā // BhS_35.272 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9088: dadyāttāmrāṇi kāṃsyāni sārokyaṃ padameti saḥ // BhS_35.275 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9091: śvetaṃ vitānaṃ raktaṃ vā kṛṣṇaṃ pītaṃ ca śyāmalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9092: dukūlenātha paṭṭena tantunānyena vā kṛtam // BhS_35.277 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9094: sopadhānāṃ satalpāṃ ca khaṭvāṃ dadyācca yohareḥ // BhS_35.278 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9098: rājyakāmī tu rājā syātsārvabhaumo 'pi jāyate // BhS_35.280 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9100: cāmaraṃ hemadaṇḍaṃ ca vyajanaṃ ratnabhūṣitam // BhS_35.281 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9101: kevalaṃ hemadaṇḍaṃ vā bhaktyā śaktyā ca saṃyutam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9106: aśakyaṃ tatphalaṃ vaktuṃ sarvairapi surāsuraiḥ // BhS_35.284 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9107: sauvarmaṃ viṣṇurūpantu yo bhaktyaiva tu kārayet /
GR14bhrgus_u:9112: haimaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ yo bhaktyaivār'payeddhareḥ // BhS_35.287 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9115: haimaṃ yānaṃ tathāruhya viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati /
GR14bhrgus_u:9117: siṃhāsanaṃ vā yo dadyātsomalokaṃ sa gacchati /
GR14bhrgus_u:9119: hṛdyavāksusvaro hṛdyo vāgmī sa tu bhavennaraḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9125: yadyaddravyaṃ mudā yukto dadyāttu haraye naraḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9126: tadagre pūjakebhyaśca gurave ca viśeṣataḥ // BhS_35.294 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9130: yadyatkarma tadarthaṃ syātparicaryā ca tasya yā // BhS_35.296 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9131: tasyopacāraṃ yatkarma karoti śraddhayā tu yaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9132: sarvayajñaphalaṃ prāpya nāmīpyaṃ padamāpnu yāt // BhS_35.297 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9136: athār'cane phalaṃ vakṣye viśeṣeṇa madhudviṣaḥ // BhS_35.299 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9138: sāyaṃ prātaśca deveśaṃ namasyannatha cintayan // BhS_35.300 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9139: yaḥ pramāmaṃ muhuḥ kuryātsa tu yajñaphalaṃ labhet /
GR14bhrgus_u:9144: yaḥ kuryātpūjanaṃ viṣṇostatra devo vaseddhruvam // BhS_35.303 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9146: ābhirūpyācca biṃbasya sannidheḥ procyate hareḥ // BhS_35.304 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9147: āsanaṃ haraye datvā pratiṣṭhāṃ labhate ciram /
GR14bhrgus_u:9150: pādyamācamanīyaṃ ca samarpya haraye naraḥ // BhS_35.306 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9152: nityaṃ puṣpāṇi puṇyāni bhaktyā yastu samarcayet // BhS_35.307 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9156: tasyānantaphalaṃ prokta mananto bhagavān hariḥ // BhS_35.309 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9160: maṅgalaṃ tasya niśchidraṃ bhavedeva na saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.311 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9162: sa cāna ntaphalaṃ prāpya modate viṣṇusannedhau // BhS_35.312 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9165: bahujātisumānāṃ ca dānena prīyate sa vai /
GR14bhrgus_u:9168: tulasīṃ mūrthni devasya samarpya madhuvidviṣaḥ // BhS_35.315 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9170: sarvāṅgeṣvarpayan puṣpaṃ sarvagasya naro hareḥ // BhS_35.316 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9178: sarveṣāmapi puṣpāṇāṃ tulasī prītidā hareḥ // BhS_35.320 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9180: anugacchati taṃ devo yathā gorvatsalā bhṛśam // BhS_35.321 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9186: ye kurvanti hareḥ pūjāṃ te kṛtārthāḥ kalau yuge // BhS_35.324 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9187: śuṣkaṃ paryuṣitaṃ vār'draṃ kāṣṭhaṃ vā tulasīdalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9190: varjyaṃ paryuṣitaṃ puṣpaṃ na varjyaṃ tulasīdalam // BhS_35.326 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9191: varjyaṃ paryuṣitaṃ toyaṃ na varjyaṃ jāhnavījalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9192: anyatparyuṣitaṃ varjyaṃ na varjyaṃ padmapuṣpakam // BhS_35.327 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9196: devā divisthitā ye vaitiṣṭhanti tulasīdale // BhS_35.329 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9198: yāvanna prāpyate puṇyā tulasī viṣṇuvallabhā // BhS_35.330 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9202: nārcayeddūrvayā durgāṃ na tulasyā surāntaram // BhS_35.332 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9206: harerabhyarcanāyāṃ ca tulasī sādhanaṃ param // BhS_35.334 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9210: tathā tuṣyati govindo yathaina tulasīdalaiḥ // BhS_35.336 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9212: tulasyaiva hareḥ pūjāṃ ye kurvanti sadā bhuvi // BhS_35.337 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9213: tasmāttulasyā sadṛśaṃ sa ca bhūtaṃ na bhāvi ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:9220: tulasīkānanaṃ yatra yatra vā harikīrtanam // BhS_35.341 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9225: sūryalokaṃ sa gatvaiva yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9226: ghṛtena kāpilenaiva dṛḍhavartiyutaṃ tu yaḥ // BhS_35.344 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9228: so 'ndhaṃ naiva praviśati narakaṃ narapuṅgavaḥ // BhS_35.345 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9232: tasya pāpāni naśyanti nirlepassa bhaviṣyati // BhS_35.347 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9234: candralokaṃ sa gatvaiva yāti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // BhS_35.348 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9235: sugandhi śubhamutpūtaṃ snānatoyaṃ ca yo dadet /
GR14bhrgus_u:9237: tataśca vāruṇaṃ lokaṃ prāpya tatraiva modate /
GR14bhrgus_u:9240: kārpāsamatha ca kṣaumaṃ kauśeyaṃ rāṅkavaṃ tathā // BhS_35.351 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9246: jāṃbūnadaṃ śātakuṃbhaṃ hāṭakaṃ vaiṇavaṃ tathā // BhS_35.354 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9247: śruṅgī ca śuktijaṃ caiva jātarūpamataḥ param /
GR14bhrgus_u:9252: rājaśriyaṃ ca bhuktvā nte viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // BhS_35.357 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9262: tasya prasannau jāyete daṃpatī jagataḥ patī // BhS_35.362 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9263: mātrāṃ ca devadesya datvā haste viśeṣataḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9272: kṛsaraṃ vinivedyaiva devasya mudito naraḥ // BhS_35.367 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9274: gaulyaṃ nivedya devasya prāpnoti guḍaparvatān // BhS_35.368 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9276: yavodanasya donena nīrogo bhavati dhruvam // BhS_35.369 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9280: sugandhi svādu śuddhaṃ ca pānīyaṃ yo harerdadet // BhS_35.371 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9282: kadalyā nārikelasya cūtasya panasasya ca // BhS_35.372 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9283: phalāni ca nupakvāni bhaktyā śuddhāni yo dadet /
GR14bhrgus_u:9287: tāṃbūlaṃ kramukairyuktaṃ mukhavāsaṃ ca yo dadet /
GR14bhrgus_u:9290: balaṃ balavatāṃ labdhvā viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // BhS_35.376 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9291: baliṃ seveta yo bhaktyā so 'pi yajñaphalaṃ labhet /
GR14bhrgus_u:9294: viṣṇoḥ kathāstu saṃkīrtyastotraiḥ stutvā ca vaiṣṇavaiḥ // BhS_35.378 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9300: sakāmānāṃ phalaṃ kāmyamakāmānāṃ paraṃ padam // BhS_35.381 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9302: utsāha utsavaḥ prokto manuṣyāṇāṃ viśeṣetaḥ // BhS_35.382 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9306: utsavaṃ devadevasya yaḥ kuryātsvakulaṃ svakam // BhS_35.384 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9307: uttārayan svayaṃ viṣṇossa yāti paramaṃ padam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9309: sa yajño vo narān yuṣmānuttārayati niścayam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9310: iti vedā vadantīti sa utsava udīrya te // BhS_35.386 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9312: yaścotsavena yajate tayostulyaṃ phalaṃ nmṛtam // BhS_35.387 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9314: devasyāśnuvate sarvaṃ ye yajante saṃśayaḥ // BhS_35.388 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9317: karmāṇā manasā vācā te 'pi yānti phalaṃ bahu /
GR14bhrgus_u:9318: grāme vā ragare va'pi pattane vā mahotsavaḥ // BhS_35.390 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9320: yatra deśe janapade rāṣṭre vā pyutsavo hareḥ // BhS_35.391 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9332: ālepanaṃ mārjanaṃ ca rajaḥ praśamanaṃ tathā // BhS_35.397 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9335: yānaṃ vahanti ye viprāste yānti brahmaṇaḥ padam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9336: rathaṃ vahanti ye cāśvāste 'pi yāntisurālayam // BhS_35.399 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9340: ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni ye tatrādhīyate janāḥ // BhS_35.401 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9341: te pare vyomni devasya pārśve vartanti nisspṛhāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9349: taddravyaṃ varthate tasya naśyaṃ tyevāśubhāni tu /
GR14bhrgus_u:9350: rājño rāṣṭrasya taddravyaṃ samṛddhyaiva bhaviṣyati // BhS_35.406 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9352: nirmāti yaḥprapāṃ viṣṇordevasya nnapanāya vai // BhS_35.407 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9382: yastu kuryājjaladroṇīṃ snānapīṭhaṃ ca śārṅgiṇaḥ // BhS_35.422 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9383: sa sarvaiḥ pūjyayānantu pīṭhe cātyunna te vaset /
GR14bhrgus_u:9384: evaṃ yassnapanaṃ viṣṇoḥ kārayecchaktito naraḥ // BhS_35.423 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9386: ante vimāsamāruhya haimaṃ devaiḥ parīvṛtaḥ // BhS_35.424 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9390: devadevasya viṣṇostu snapanaṃ bhaktimāṃstu yaḥ // BhS_35.426 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9391: seveta so 'pi pāpmabhyo mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9394: utsavaṃ sevateyastu so 'pi yajñaphalaṃ labhet // BhS_35.428 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9398: anyeṣvapi ca puṇyeṣu kāryeṣu jagataḥ prabhum // BhS_35.430 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9401: khaṇḍite sphaṭite dhāmni dūṣite ca sūdhādibhiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9402: samādadhyātpunardhāma sa lokaṃ yāti vaiṣṇavaṃ // BhS_35.432 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9404: sthāpayedbhakti yuktaśca sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // BhS_35.433 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9406: yaḥ sandhāya punaḥ kuryātpritiṣṭhāṃ pūrvavanmudā // BhS_35.434 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9408: śīrṇe jīrṇe tathā bhinne bhūṣaṇādau viśeṣataḥ // BhS_35.435 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9412: tasya kāyakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tatkṣaṇādeva naśyati // BhS_35.437 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9416: yo dadyāducitāṃ vṛttiṃ sa yamaṃ nopasarpati // BhS_35.439 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9422: tasya vāso bhavetsvarge cāvadidrāśca turdhaśa // BhS_35.442 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9424: tasya tuṣyati deveśassa tu svārājyamaśnu te // BhS_35.443 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9426: dṛṣṭvā ca śraddhayā yuktoyo devamupatiṣṭhate // BhS_35.444 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9432: prāyaścittavidhānaṃ tu provāca jagatāṃ hitaḥ // BhS_35.447 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9439: tasya puṇyaphalaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyaṃ tridaśairapi /
GR14bhrgus_u:9440: iha loke 'khilān kāmānanubhūya sukhaṃ cirāt // BhS_35.451 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9450: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa kriyālope ca yatphalam // BhS_35.456 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9457: svayaṃ nivartate yastu tasya syānmahatī vipat /
GR14bhrgus_u:9458: saṃkalpya devatāgāraṃ nirmātuṃ yo viśeṣataḥ // BhS_35.460 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9460: ācāryassatataṃ goptā ācāryastu pitā smṛtaḥ // BhS_35.461 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9462: ārabhya gehanirmāṇaṃ devasya jagataḥ pateḥ // BhS_35.462 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9463: asamāpya tu yo mūḍho nivarte pravilobhataḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9464: tasya saṃpadvināśassyāt kruddho bhavati cāvyayaḥ // BhS_35.463 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9466: yaḥ kuryādantarāyaṃ tu tasya puṇyaṃ vinaśyati // BhS_35.464 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9467: yena vighnastadā bhūyāttaṃ hatvāpi na doṣabhāk /
GR14bhrgus_u:9468: yastu śāstroditaṃ karma kurvantaṃ ca padārthinam // BhS_35.465 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9472: adhvare vartamāne tu saṃbhārān śāstracoditān // BhS_35.467 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9473: yo na dadyātsa pāpīyān nāpnuyāt karmajaṃ phalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9474: pratiṣṭhāpya harerbiṃbaṃ yo na satkurute gurum // BhS_35.468 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9476: pratiṣṭhānte tathā nityamavicchinnaṃ tu pūjitum // BhS_35.469 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9480: sa bhavedbrahmahā caiva dhanaṃ tasya vilupyati // BhS_35.471 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9484: anyaṃ vā yojayettatra tāvubhau vinaśiṣyataḥ // BhS_35.473 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9488: sarve ca kramaśaḥ pūjāṃ kartumarhanti te yataḥ // BhS_35.475 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9489: pitryaṃ bhavati devasya dāyādyaṃ pūjanaṃ svataḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9492: yastudadyādarcakāya bhṛtyarthaṃ ke valaṃ dhanam // BhS_35.477 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9500: nirmāti brāhmaṇaṃ bhūyo yajamānastu devalam // BhS_35.481 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9508: svadattāṃ varadattāṃ vā yo hareta vasundharām // BhS_35.485 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9514: pañca kanyānṛte hanti daśa hanti gavānṛte // BhS_35.488 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9517: sarvaṃ bhūmyanṛte hanti no brūyādanṛtaṃ kvacit /
GR14bhrgus_u:9522: brahmasvaṃ brahmahatyā ca daridrasya ca yaddhanam // BhS_35.492 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9524: brahmasve no matiṃ kuryātprāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairapi // BhS_35.493 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9530: lohacūrṇāṃśca cūrṇāṃśca viṣaṃ vā jarayetpumān // BhS_35.496 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9532: devasvaṃ brāhmaṇasvaṃ ca lobheno pahinasti yaḥ // BhS_35.497 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9538: daśavājisamā kanyā bhūmidānena sā samā // BhS_35.500 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9540: ācchettācānumantā ca tānyena narake vaset // BhS_35.501 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9542: brāhmaṇānāṃ hṛte kṣetre hanyādāsaptamaṃ kulam // BhS_35.502 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9544: dadaddhi bhūmiṃ sādhubhyo vindate phūmimuttamām // BhS_35.503 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9548: tadarcakārpitāṃ bhūmiṃ yo hareta yateta vā // BhS_35.505 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9549: kiṃ punastasya vaktavyaṃ na bhavettasya niṣkṛtiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9550: na vācā śakyate vaktuṃ gatistasya durātmanaḥ // BhS_35.506 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9551: mriyeta sadya evāsau jāyate 'tha punaḥ punaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9552: na tasya śaraṇaṃ kvāpi labhyate pāpakarmaṇaḥ // BhS_35.507 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9556: vasanti bhūyo jāyante nīcayoniṣu ca dhruvam // BhS_35.509 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9558: gale nigalitaḥ pāśaiḥ kṛṣyate nirayeṣu saḥ // BhS_35.510 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9566: uṣitvā narakeṣvete jāyante phaṇināṃ kule // BhS_35.514 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9576: kṛtinaḥ pretya narake pacyante duḥkhabhāginaḥ // BhS_35.519 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9578: upacārādihāno tu pāpasyedaṃ phalaṃ bhavet // BhS_35.520 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9586: snānadravyavihīne ca snānahīne tathaiva ca // BhS_35.524 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9590: agnidāhabhayaṃ caiva mandāgnitvaṃ ca jāyate // BhS_35.526 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9602: anyārāmodbhavaṃ puṣpaṃ nār'payediti ke cana // BhS_35.532 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9603: ārahare ca śukre ca manvādiṣu yugādiṣu /
GR14bhrgus_u:9606: tulasīṃ ye vicinvanti te kṛntanti hareśśiraḥ // BhS_35.534 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9610: bhugnapatraṃ na ca grāhyaṃ kṛmiduṣṭaṃ ca nāharet // BhS_35.536 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9612: sthalajaṃ noddharetpuṣpaṃ chedayejjalajaṃ na tu // BhS_35.537 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9617: snānaṃ kṛtvā tu ye ke citpuṣpaṃ gṛhṇanti vaidvijāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9620: snānaṃ kṛtvātu madhyāhne puṣpāṇi na samāharet // BhS_35.541 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9623: sa tu tenaiva pāpena maṇḍūko jāyate naraḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9626: sa pūti gandhasaṃyuktaḥ kuṣṭhī caiva prajāyate // BhS_35.544 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9627: janmadvayaṃ tu vai mūḍhaśśūdratāṃ yāti mānavaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:9633: arghyahīne tu devasya kulaṃ bhavati ninditam /
GR14bhrgus_u:9639: havirnivedane hīne durbhikṣaṃ bhavati dhruvam // BhS_35.550 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9641: nālikeraphale hīne hīne kṣīrādike tathā // BhS_35.551 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9643: hīne bhakṣyādike caiva vividhe haviṣī prabho // BhS_35.552 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9649: śāntasya pūjane hīne tathā caivānapāyinām // BhS_35.555 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9656: bhūtapīṭhasya pārśve vā dakṣiṇe vā viśeṣataḥ, /
GR14bhrgus_u:9659: śrīdevyā arcane hīne saṃpadāṃ tu bhavet kṣayaḥ // BhS_35.560 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9661: agnipūjāvihīne tu nyūne vā mantravarjite // BhS_35.561 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9667: balakṣayo janānāṃ syātpitṝṇāṃ patanaṃ bhavet // BhS_35.564 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9673: biṃbanyāsavihīne tu kalatraṃ tasya naśyati // BhS_35.567 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9676: dakṣiṇādānahīne tu sā pūjā niṣphalā bhavet /
GR14bhrgus_u:9687: utsave ca viśeṣaṇa yajamānabhayaṃ bhavet // BhS_35.574 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9689: viṣude cāyane caiva hīne tatroktakarmaṇi // BhS_35.575 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9692: akāle ca kṛte vāpi bhavet kṣāmabhayaṃ tathā /
GR14bhrgus_u:9695: nimitte yadi saṃprāpte snāpayeccenna mādhavam // BhS_35.578 //

GR14bhrgus_u:9910: ye tu deva gṛhaṃ gatvā tatra sevārthamāgatāḥ // BhS_36.79 //

GR14bhrgus_u:9936: mahajvāle ca narake pāpāḥ pacyanti sarvataḥ // BhS_36.92 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9938: pṛṣṭhenānīya jaṅghe dve vinyaste srandhayojite // BhS_36.93 //
GR14bhrgus_u:9940: baddhvā parasparaṃ sarvaṃ sudṛḍhaṃ pāparajjubhiḥ // BhS_36.94 //

GR14bhrgus_u:9986: pradattāṃ devadevasya tannāmnā pūjakasya vā // BhS_36.117 //

GR14bhrgus_u:10000: aropyante gude teṣāṃ yāvanmūrdhni vinirgataiḥ // BhS_36.124 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10001: tataḥ kṣāreṇa mahatā tāmreṇa trapuṇā punaḥ /

GR14bhrgus_u:10006: dhane satyapi ye dānaṃ na ca yacchanti tṛṣṇayā // BhS_36.127 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10014: jihvā tataḥ prabhinnā ca gāḍhaṃ śṛṅkhalayā punaḥ // BhS_36.131 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10017: khādituṃ dīyate teṣāṃ sūcyagreṇa ca śoṇitam /

GR14bhrgus_u:10020: bhidyante varṣa dhārābhiśśuṣyante vāyunā punaḥ // BhS_36.134 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10024: tasmātpāpaṃ na kurvīta cañcale jīvite sati // BhS_36.136 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10026: tataḥ kṣitiṃ samāsādya jāyante dehinaḥ punaḥ // BhS_36.137 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10045: aśakto 'pyatha vāśakta āḍhyo vā durvidho 'dha vā // BhS_36.146 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10047: na hi saṃharate jyotsnāṃ candraścaṇḍālaveśmani // BhS_36.147 //

GR14bhrgus_u:10052: sa eva bahudhā loke māyayā bhidyate svayā /
GR14bhrgus_u:10053: viṣṇvākhyassa svayaṃ māyaṃ prakṛtiṃ vyajya sa dvidhā // BhS_36.150 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10057: catasra eva vijñeyā vedavarṇa yugāśrayāḥ // BhS_36.152 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10071: sa trayodaśadhā caiva viśvedevādibhiḥ sthitaḥ // BhS_36.159 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10073: tithibhiḥ pañcadaśadhā bhinno jñeyassu vai prabhuḥ // BhS_36.160 //

GR14bhrgus_u:10091: rudrā ekādaśa jñe yā stasya kaṇṭhaṃ samāśritā // BhS_36.169 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10098: nadyaśca vasudhā cāsya nāgāśca nalake sthitāḥ /

GR14bhrgus_u:10103: ṛtavo bāhumūle tu māsāḥ karataleṣu ca // BhS_36.175 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10112: nāmnāṃ śataṃ sahasraṃ vā tathānantaṃ paṭhantiyat /

GR14bhrgus_u:10118: brāhmaṇā mukhate yasya kṣatriyā yasya bāhutaḥ /

GR14bhrgus_u:10125: tatprasādādṛte jñātuṃ vaktuṃ vā naiva śakyate // BhS_36.186 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10127: aśeṣaṃ vāṅmayaṃ cedaṃ lokālokaṃ carācaram // BhS_36.187 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10137: avibhaktaṃ ca bhūteṣu vibhaktamiva ca sthitam // BhS_36.192 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10138: bhūtabhartṛca tad jñeyaṃ grasiṣṇu prabhaviṣṇu ca /

GR14bhrgus_u:10157: sarvabhūtāni caivācau na tadastīha yanna saḥ // BhS_36.202 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10165: aśvikṛṣṇau ca dikṣveṣāṃ lokairaṇḍaṃ sahākhilam // BhS_36.206 //

GR14bhrgus_u:10217: sa yāmīryātanāḥ prāpya todyate yamakiṅkaraiḥ // BhS_36.232 //

GR14bhrgus_u:10253: sa eva sarvabhūtātmā nara ityabhidhīyate // BhS_36.250 //

GR14bhrgus_u:10277: deveśasyotsavo yatra grāme vā nagare 'pi vā // BhS_36.262 //

GR14bhrgus_u:10283: śrutvā devotsavāraṃbhaṃ paṅgūbhāvena yo naraḥ // BhS_36.265 //

GR14bhrgus_u:10301: sa pāpiṣṭhataro loke niṣkṛtirnāsya vidyate // BhS_36.274 //

GR14bhrgus_u:10337: sa yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ yāvadābhūtasaṃplavam // BhS_36.292 //

GR14bhrgus_u:10347: purīṣaṃ vātra kurvīta yo naro bhagavadgṛhe // BhS_36.297 //

GR14bhrgus_u:10351: sa tiṣṭhedraurave ghore varṣāṇāmayutaṃ śatam // BhS_36.299 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10357: tathā nirlekhayejjihvāṃ sa pāpī naśyati dhruvam // BhS_36.302 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10360: sa yāti gṛhagodhātvaṃ navajanmāni pañca ca /

GR14bhrgus_u:10363: balibhugyonitāṃ yāti janmāni subahūni vai // BhS_36.305 //

GR14bhrgus_u:10371: chāyāmākramya yo mohādyāti viṣṇostu mandiram // BhS_36.309 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10378: apasavyaṃ ca dhṛtvaiva dhṛtvā caiva nivītavat // BhS_36.312 //

GR14bhrgus_u:10406: janmadvayantu vai mūḍhāśśūdratāṃ yānti te narāḥ // BhS_36.326 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10408: sa pūtigandhasaṃyuktaḥ kuṣṭhī caiva bhaveddhruvam // BhS_36.327 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10410: jātakaṃ mṛtakaṃ vāpi yasyāśaucaṃ vidhīyate // BhS_36.328 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10419: upanīto vasenmā vā tathā gurukule kramāt /
GR14bhrgus_u:10430: yastu devagṛhadvāre prasārya caraṇau kvacit // BhS_36.338 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10437: tatassūkaratāṃ prāpya janmāni nava pañca ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:10438: kliśyate bahubhiḥ kaṣṭairna śayīta harergṛhe // BhS_36.342 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10440: devālaye viśeṣeṇa prākāre vāpi mūḍhadhīḥ // BhS_36.343 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10442: sapta pañca ca janmāni tato mānuṣatāṃ vrajet // BhS_36.344 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10444: sa bhaveddurmanā dīno pretya ceha ca janmani // BhS_36.345 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10448: āsanāni tvasaṃkhyāni devāgāre na cācaret // BhS_36.347 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10452: savyaṃ khūlaṃ sukhaṃ caiva gomukhaṃ garuḍaṃ tathā // BhS_36.349 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10454: kuñjaraṃ kukkuṭaṃ nāgaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ kraiñcaṃ ca kūrmakam // BhS_36.350 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10456: yonyāsanaṃ vāsakaṃ ca dhīraṃ padmāsanaṃ tathā // BhS_36.351 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10458: tripadaṃ hastikarṇaṃ ca hemamardhāsanaṃ tathā // BhS_36.352 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10460: anyāni śāstrasiddhāni yāni santi viśeṣataḥ // BhS_36.353 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10462: bhuñjīyāddevatāgāre yaḥ pāpassa tu durmanāḥ // BhS_36.354 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10463: kukṣirogārdito bhūtvā janmāni daśa pañca ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:10466: devāgāre viśeṣeṇa sa bhavennindito janaḥ // BhS_36.356 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10470: āpośanaṃ tu kṛtvaiva yadadyādbhojanaṃ tutat // BhS_36.358 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10474: sa gacchennarakān krūrān yāvanta udabindavaḥ // BhS_36.360 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10476: niveditaṃ tu devasya devasyāgre viśeṣataḥ // BhS_36.361 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10485: niveditaṃ tu devasya saṃtuṣṭyaisvasya tasya ca /
GR14bhrgus_u:10486: tasya tuṣyati deveśa ādātā tu vipadyate // BhS_36.366 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10490: na jātu pāvayennaiva pāvayetpāvayenna tu // BhS_36.368 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10493: tena bhuktaṃ bhavetpāpaṃ dātureva na saṃśayaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10498: pretya sṛgālatāṃ yānti nava janmāni pañca ca // BhS_36.372 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10500: caṇḍālo jāyate pretya kṣudhitaśca carenmuhuḥ // BhS_36.373 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10501: vikrīṇate tu ye viprā vāṇijye dattacakṣuṣaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10505: kaṇamannasya vāna syāttapyante tatra te janāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10506: ye gṛhītvā tadannādi bhuñjate kṣudhitā janāḥ // BhS_36.376 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10508: annaṃ prāṇā manuṣyāṇāṃ sarvamanne pratiṣṭhitam // BhS_36.377 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10510: annaṃ vikrīṇate ye tu prāṇavikrayiṇaḥ smṛtāḥ // BhS_36.378 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10516: sa nidhiṃ puratassiddhaṃ tyaktvā bhikṣati kākiṇīm // BhS_36.381 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10520: sā hānistanmamahacchidraṃ sā bhrāntissā tu vikriyā // BhS_36.383 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10524: magneneva mahāsiṃdhau hateneva ca vātyayā // BhS_36.385 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10528: tasmāddevagṛhaṃ gatvā naro nānyaparo bhavet // BhS_36.387 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10530: sa sarvo 'pi mudhā proktomithyetyeke vadantitam // BhS_36.388 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10531: na hi devasya purataḥ kvacidapyanṛtaṃ vadet /
GR14bhrgus_u:10532: satyasvarūpī bhagavān satyaṃ tasmaina gūhayet // BhS_36.389 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10533: satyameva paraṃ brahma satyameva paraṃ tapaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10534: satyameva paro yajñassatyameva paraṃ śrutam // BhS_36.390 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10535: satyaṃ deveṣu jāgarti satyaṃ dharmataroḥ phalam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10537: ādyo vidhiśca vidyā ca sarvaṃ satye pratiṣṭhitam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10538: satyaṃ yajñantathā vedāssatyā devī sarasvatī // BhS_36.392 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10544: satyaṃ tu vadato loke tulitaṃ syānna saṃśayaḥ // BhS_36.395 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10545: aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā kṛtam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10548: satyamāhuḥparaṃ dharmaṃ satyamāhuḥ paraṃ padam // BhS_36.397 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10549: satyamāhuḥ paraṃ brahma tasmātsatyaṃ na lobhayet /
GR14bhrgus_u:10554: vaktavyaṃ ca sadā satyaṃ na satyādvidyate param // BhS_36.400 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10556: snātavyaṃ manasā yuktaistatsnānaṃ paramaṃ smṛtam // BhS_36.401 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10557: devārthe vā parārthe vā putrārthe vā ''tmane tathā /
GR14bhrgus_u:10558: ye 'nṛtaṃ nābhibhāṣante te svargaṃ yāntimānavāḥ // BhS_36.402 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10563: parīkṣante ca sarvāsu daśāsu puruṣaṃ sadā /
GR14bhrgus_u:10566: devāgāre viśeṣeṇa te praṇaśyanti sānvayam // BhS_36.406 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10570: te yānti narakaṃ pāpā jāyante nīcayoniṣu // BhS_36.408 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10572: tathānte krūrā nava janmāni pañca ca // BhS_36.409 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10574: te 'pi tittiritāṃ bhūtvā jāyante janmapañcakam // BhS_36.410 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10578: asārāṇi tu śāstrāṇi bhūyāṃsi pṛthivītale // BhS_36.412 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10580: teṣu śāstreṣu ye jātāśśāstrārthāśca viśeṣataḥ // BhS_36.413 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10582: citraśilpā na saṃdeho narastena na mucyate // BhS_36.414 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10583: sā vidyā yā hariṃ stauti sā kriyā yattadarcanam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10584: yā nyā yadanyadakhilaṃ duṣṭodarkā hi jīvikā // BhS_36.415 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10585: na hi devagṛhaṃ gatvā śāstrārthairnī rasairnaraḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10587: viśālaṃ vāṅmayaṃ sarvaṃ sṛṣṭvā sraṣṭā hariḥ prabhuḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10593: pāṭhanaṃ lekhanādyaṃ ca naiva kuryādgṛhe hareḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10596: yastu devagṛhaṃ gatvā roditi praṇayādyathā // BhS_36.421 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10597: duḥkhitaḥ stauti vā devaṃ tatsyānmānasikaṃ malam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10598: nirvāṇaparamaṃ sthānaṃ mlānena manasā tu yaḥ // BhS_36.422 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10599: sevate sa na jānāti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10600: nārī vā puruṣo vāpi gatvā devagṛhaṃ kvacit // BhS_36.423 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10605: prāpya tit tiritāṃ kālaṃ vasiṣyanti ciraṃ bhuvi /
GR14bhrgus_u:10606: naivātra hiṃsāṃ kurvīta prāṇināṃ duḥkhadāṃ kvacit // BhS_36.426 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10611: kāmakrodhau ca saṃyamya tataḥ siddhimavāpnu te /
GR14bhrgus_u:10613: ātmanassukhamanvicchan sa pretya na sukhī bhavet /
GR14bhrgus_u:10614: ātmopamastu bhūteṣu yo vaibhavati pūruṣaḥ // BhS_36.430 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10620: prakhyāpane ca dāne ca sukhaduḥkhe priyāpriye // BhS_36.433 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10622: ṛṣayo brāhmaṇā devāḥ praśaṃsanti viśeṣataḥ // BhS_36.434 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10624: karmaṇā na naraḥ kurvan hiṃsāṃ jātu vicakṣaṇaḥ, // BhS_36.435 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10625: vācā ca manasā caiva tato duḥkhātpramucyate /
GR14bhrgus_u:10628: yathā sarvaścatuṣpādvai tribhiḥ pādairna tiṣṭhati // BhS_36.437 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10632: evaṃ lokeṣvahiṃsā tu nirdiṣṭādharmataḥ purā // BhS_36.439 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10634: yatsarveṣviha bhūteṣu dayāhiṃsātmikā tu yā // BhS_36.440 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10635: na bhayaṃ vidyate jātu narasyeha dayāvataḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10638: abhayaṃ sarvabhūtāni dadatīti jagau śrutiḥ // BhS_36.442 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10639: kṣataṃ ca patitaṃ caiva skhalitaṃ klinnamāhatam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10640: sarvabhūtāni rakṣanti sameṣu viṣameṣu ca // BhS_36.443 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10641: nainaṃ vyālamṛgā ghnanti na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10642: mucyate bhayakāleṣu mokṣayedyo bhaye parān // BhS_36.444 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10643: prāṇadānātparaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
GR14bhrgus_u:10644: na hyātmanaḥ priyakaraṃ kiṃ cidastīha niścitam // BhS_36.445 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10646: mṛtyukāle hi bhūtānāṃ sadyo jāyeta vepathuḥ // BhS_36.446 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10652: hanyamānāśca dṛśyante vivaśā ghātukā narāḥ // BhS_36.449 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10654: ākramya māryamāṇāśca trāsyantyanye punaḥ punaḥ // BhS_36.450 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10660: ahiṃsā paramaṃ dānamahiṃsā paramaṃ tapaḥ // BhS_36.453 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10662: ahiṃsā paramaṃ mitramahiṃsā paramaṃ sukham // BhS_36.454 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10663: sarvayajñeṣu vā dānaṃ sarvatīrtheṣu vā plutam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10666: ahiṃsrassarvabhūtānāṃ yathā mātā yathā pitā // BhS_36.456 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10670: dhānyānyapi na hiṃseta yassa bhūyādahiṃsakaḥ // BhS_36.458 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10673: tapyamāne śarīre tu śarīre cendriyāṇi tu /
GR14bhrgus_u:10674: tiṣṭhanti svavaśe tasya nṛpāṇāmiva kiṅkarāḥ // BhS_36.460 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10676: indriyāṇāṃ nirodhena dānena ca damena ca // BhS_36.461 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10685: pītvā ca bhakṣayitvā ca upavāsavrataṃ caret // BhS_36.466 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10687: na prāśnīyādvimūḍhātmā rauravaṃ narakaṃ vrajet // BhS_36.467 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10688: na hi devagṛhaṃ gatvā vivadeta naraḥ kvacit /
GR14bhrgus_u:10689: na tat sthānaṃ vivādasya tasmāttaṃ dūrata styajet // BhS_36.468 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10690: mano 'navasthitaṃ yasya sa nālaṃ pūjitaṃ harim /
GR14bhrgus_u:10691: yasyaiva nirmalaṃ cittaṃ sor'hassarveṣu karmasu // BhS_36.469 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10695: na badhnāti padaṃ haṃsaḥ kadācitkardamāṃbhasi // BhS_36.471 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10696: na yogyā mādhavaṃ stotuṃ vāgduṣṭā cānṛtādinā /
GR14bhrgus_u:10703: aśikṣayaiva manasaḥ prāyo lokaśca vañcyate // BhS_36.475 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10707: kruddhaḥ pāpaṃ na kuryātkaḥ kruddho hanyādgurūnapi // BhS_36.477 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10711: vācyāvācyaṃ prakupito na vicānāti karhi cit // BhS_36.479 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10713: yassamutpatitaṃ krodhaṃ kṣamayā tu nirasyati // BhS_36.480 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10714: yathoragastvacaṃ jīrṇāṃ sa vai puruṣa ucyate /
GR14bhrgus_u:10717: parāpavādaṃ na brūyānnāpriyaṃ ca kadā cana // BhS_36.482 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10721: sa eva bhagavān devassarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktiyuk // BhS_36.484 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10724: iti saṃcintya bhūyo 'pi sarveṣvapi ca jantuṣu /
GR14bhrgus_u:10729: sa yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ na daivaṃ tasya mṛṣyati // BhS_36.488 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10731: devatāmandiraṃ prāpya kāleṣvanyeṣu vā tathā // BhS_36.489 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10735: maryādāsu sa tiṣṭhanti sa doṣaḥ strīṣu garhitaḥ // BhS_36.491 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10737: striyo hi mūlaṃ doṣāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // BhS_36.492 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10741: pāpīyaso narān yadvai tyaktalajjā bhajantitāḥ // BhS_36.494 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10742: strīyaṃ hi yaḥ prārthayate sannikarṣaṃ ca gacchatir /
GR14bhrgus_u:10743: iṣacca kurute sevāṃ tamevecchanti yoṣitaḥ // BhS_36.495 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10747: rūpavantaṃ virūpaṃ vā pumānityeva bhuñjate // BhS_36.497 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10754: paṅguṣvanyeṣu kuṣṭheṣu ye cānye kutsitā narāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10757: apyanyonyaṃ pravartantena hi tiṣṭhanti bhartṛṣu // BhS_36.502 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10761: vadhabandhabhayāccāpi svayaṃ guptā bhavanti tāḥ // BhS_36.504 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10763: prājasya puruṣasyeva yathā bhāvās tathā strīyaḥ // BhS_36.505 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10767: dṛṣṭvaiva puruṣaṃ hyanyaṃ yoniḥ praklidyate striyāḥ // BhS_36.507 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10769: rakṣitāraṃ na mṛṣyanti svabhartāramasat striyaḥ // BhS_36.508 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10773: kṣuradhārā viṣaḥ sarpo vahnirityekataḥ striyaḥ // BhS_36.510 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10775: na cāsāṃ mucyate kaścitpuruṣo hastamāgataḥ // BhS_36.511 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10777: śaṃbarasya ca yā māyā yā māyā namucerapi // BhS_36.512 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10779: hasantaṃ prahasantyetā rudantaṃ prarudanti ca // BhS_36.513 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10781: yadi jihmā sahasraṃ syājjīvecca śaradāṃ śatam // BhS_36.514 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10783: uśanā veda yacchāstraṃ yacca veda bṛhaspatiḥ // BhS_36.515 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10784: strībuddhyā na viśiṣyeta surakṣyā na bhavantitāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10786: iti yāstāḥ kathaṃ rakṣyāḥ puruṣairdurbharāḥ striyaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10788: apāstāśca tathā sadyo vikurvanti manaḥ striyaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10789: na ca strīṇāṃ kriyāḥ kāściditi dharmo vyavasthitaḥ // BhS_36.518 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10792: durvāgarbhavaṃ ratiṃ caiva dadau strībhyaḥ prajāpatiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10793: na tāsāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ śakyaṃ kartuṃ puṃsāṃ kathaṃ cana // BhS_36.520 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10795: vācā ca vadhabandhairvā kleśairvā vividhaistathā // BhS_36.521 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10796: na śakyā rakṣitāṃ nāryastā hi nityamasaṃyatāḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10799: nātaḥ paraṃ hi nārīṇāṃ vidyate ca kadā cana // BhS_36.523 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10802: na ca dahyanti gacchantyaḥ sutaptairapi pāṃsubhiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10803: nānilo 'gnirna varuṇo na cānye tridaśāntathā // BhS_36.525 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10804: priyāḥ strīṇāṃ yathā kāmo ratiśīlā hi yoṣitaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10805: sahasrekila nārīṇāṃ prāpyetaikā kadā cana // BhS_36.526 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10807: naitā jānanti pitaraṃ na kulaṃ na ca mātaram // BhS_36.527 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10808: na bhrātṝnna ca bhartāraṃ na ca putrān na devarān /
GR14bhrgus_u:10809: līlāyantyaḥ kulaṃ ghnanti kūlānīva saridvarāḥ // BhS_36.528 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10811: na te sukhāya mantavyāḥ svedajā iva bindavaḥ // BhS_36.529 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10815: tādṛśaṃ strīṣu vijñeyaṃ nādhikaṃ tāsu vidyate // BhS_36.531 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10817: tadvat strīṣvapi vijñeyaṃ na saukhyaṃ paramārthataḥ // BhS_36.532 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10819: tādṛśaṃ strīṣu vijñeyaṃ nādhikaṃ tāsu vidyate // BhS_36.533 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10821: tathā devotsavādīnāṃ sevā tāsāṃ niṣidhyate // BhS_36.534 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10822: na hi svatantrato yoṣijjātu gacchet sthalāntaram /
GR14bhrgus_u:10823: na hi nirmimate vṛddhā līlayā devamandirān // BhS_36.535 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10825: anugacchetpitā bhrātā bhartā putro 'tha vā yadi // BhS_36.536 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10833: tasmāt strīṣu na kartavyaḥ prasaṃgo devatākṛhe // BhS_36.540 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10836: na hīdṛśamanāyuṣyaṃ loke kiṃ cana vidyate /
GR14bhrgus_u:10839: yāvanto romakūpāḥ syuḥ strīṇāṃ gātreṣu nirmitāḥ // BhS_36.543 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10848: sa tu caṇḍālatāṃ prāpya jāyate janmanāṃ śatam /
GR14bhrgus_u:10856: iti devagṛhaṃ gantuṃ vyādhito naiva cārhati /
GR14bhrgus_u:10859: arcituṃ sevituṃ cāpi dātuṃ dravyacayaṃ tathā // BhS_36.553 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10862: janmāni nava pañcāpi jāyate malabhuk kṛmiḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10868: uṣṇīṣī na ca seveta naiva pāṇau dhṛtāyudhaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10871: śvitrī saṃjāyate mūḍho navajanmāni pañca ca // BhS_36.559 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10873: caṇḍālayonitāṃ yāti nava janmāni pañca ca // BhS_36.560 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10875: tvaṅkāro vā vadho veti vidvatsu na niśiṣyate // BhS_36.561 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10877: paranindā ca śāstrasya parasya tu vinindanam // BhS_36.562 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10879: nindayā vai pareṣāṃ tu ninditāste punassmṛtāḥ // BhS_36.563 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10881: tathā parastutiṃ caiva vidhinā saṃtyajennaraḥ // BhS_36.564 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10882: paraḥ parātmā puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ procyate tu yaḥ /
GR14bhrgus_u:10883: tadagre 'nyasya devasya na stutiṃ stāvayennaraḥ // BhS_36.565 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10885: pūjayedyadi manyeta pūjārhaṃ vāsa naśyati // BhS_36.566 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10893: śaktau satyāṃ viśeṣeṇa yastulobhādinā naraḥ // BhS_36.570 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10895: na tasya vidyate puṇyaṃ sa tūcchāstraṃ vravartate // BhS_36.571 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10900: tasmātkurvīta yatnena śaktilobhaṃ na jātu cit /
GR14bhrgus_u:10901: anyathā yadi kurvāṇaḥ phalaṃ naiva prapadyate // BhS_36.574 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10903: viṣaṃ prāśnāti sammūḍho yassvasmai pacate naraḥ // BhS_36.575 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10909: viṣṇorniveditaṃ yastu na bhuṅkte manujādhamaḥ // BhS_36.578 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10917: yā ca bhūyāṃsi loke 'sminnutpādayati santatam // BhS_36.582 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10923: navāni kāle jātāni sasyādīni viśeṣataḥ // BhS_36.585 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10927: teyāntinarakān ghorān kṛtaghnā yāntiyān bahūn // BhS_36.587 //
GR14bhrgus_u:10929: navaṃ sasyaṃ phalaṃ puṣpaṃ dadhikṣīraṃ ghṛtaṃ madhu // BhS_36.588 //

GR14bhrgus_u:10934: so 'pi caṇḍālatāṃ prāpya naśyedeva na saṃśayaḥ /

GR14bhrgus_u:10947: yastu devagṛhaṃ prāptān vaiṣṇavān bhagavatpriyān // BhS_36.597 //

GR14bhrgus_u:10969: te dvijāstat strīyaścāpi sevante tatra saṃgatāḥ // BhS_36.608 //

GR14bhrgus_u:11044: aparādhāḥ kṛtā ye tān kṣamasva puruṣottama // BhS_36.645 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11046: aparādhaḥ kṛto yastaṃ kṣamasva puruṣottama // BhS_36.646 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11048: aparādhaḥ kṛto yastaṃ kṣamasva puruṣottama // BhS_36.647 //

GR14bhrgus_u:11073: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaśca kaliśceti caturyugam // BhS_37.1 //

GR14bhrgus_u:11080: na bhayaṃ na ca santāpo na lobho na ca mānitā /

GR14bhrgus_u:11188: hartāro na ca dātārobhaviṣyanti kalau yuge /

GR14bhrgus_u:11199: vadanti vācā dharmāṃśca cetasā pāpalolupāḥ // BhS_37.64 //
GR14bhrgus_u:11203: bhaviṣyanti kalau prāpti rājāno mlecchajātayaḥ // BhS_37.66 //

GR14bhrgus_u:11423: adya cātā jaganmātā phālgune revatī tithau // BhS_37.176 //

GR14bhrgus_u:11441: kadā bhādrapado māsastatra caikādaśī bhavet // BhS_37.185 //

GR14bhrgus_u:11469: idaṃ ca bhagavacchāstraṃ cirasthāyi kariṣyati // BhS_37.199 //

GR14bhrgus_u:11475: tadā harirmahāvīraḥ kalkī nāma bhaviṣyati // BhS_37.202 //

GR14bhrgus_u:11511: śrī vikhanasamahāgurave namaḥ śrautasmārtādikaṃ karma nikhilaṃ yena sūtritam tasmai samastavedārthavide vikhanase namaḥ.
GR14bhrgus_u:11512: jayatyātmeśvarosni dradhyāna saudhapriyātithiḥ śrīmatpatrapurīvāsaḥ śrīrāmassītayā gṛhī.
